item.description:
Cinema City is doing a series of classic movies on Sundays at 11:00am. I am going to schedule meetups for all of them even if I cannot attend, to let people know about them.

For those who don't know "Some Like It Hot" - starring Tony Curtis, who died last week, with Jack Lemmon and Marilyn Monroe - the quick synopsis is "Struggling musicians witness the St. Valentine's Day Massacre and are now on the run from the Mob. Jerry and Joe cross-dress into an all female band. In addition to hiding, each has his own problems; One falls for another band member but can't tell her his gender, and the other has a rich suitor who will not take "No," for an answer."

I've seen the movie more times than I can count and always notice something new. Go, enjoy!

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "Some Like It Hot" - Cine Classics at Cinema City at the Palace
